data.name: Warface - Joker's Pack
data.detailed_description:
This delightful package contains the following items:


  • Gun-Glove! (30 days)

  • Wooden Hammer (30 days)

  • Aquatic Assassinator (30 days)

  • Digger of Doom (30 days)

  • Banana Claymore (x100)

This unique pack offers weapons filled with cutting edge technology that would make the gadgets of Secret Service seem like mere toys. Incredible destruction capability is literally at your fingertips. But be warned, with great power comes great responsibility.

MORE ABOUT THE WEAPONS:


Gun-Glove! This devilish device is well-hidden on you hands, so that any observer will consider you unarmed. In reality, your fingers cloak not only the mightiest pistol in existence but also the best scope in the world.

Wooden Hammer. Humble in looks, this day-to-day instrument hides the mighty tenchnology rivalling that of Thor's mythical weapon. Unlike Norse hammer though, this one also helps to pack the goods after the selection is completed.

Aquatic Assassinator. Masked as a waterpark toy, this gun is filled with liquid that melts any obstacles. Put on your sunglasses and prepare for some bold assasinations, agent.

Digger of Doom. This plaything won't attract unnecessary attention regardless of the environment you find yourself in. What's even better - this item alone has more destructive potential than all of Blackwood's nuclear facilities together.

Banana Claymore. Classy trick with an unexpected twist. The route of espionage is quite slippery, especially if you are against an expert armed with a notoriously legendary weapon - the BANANA.

data.short_description: This unique pack offers weapons filled with cutting edge technology that would make the gadgets of Secret Service seem like mere toys. Incredible destruction capability is literally at your fingertips. But be warned, with great power comes great responsibility.
data.supported_languages:
English*, French*, German*, Polish*, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Portuguese - Brazil, Korean, Russian
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel/AMD Dual-Core 2.0 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 8600 GT 256MB / AMD ATI Radeon X1950 256MB
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card with latest drivers
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core2Duo E6-series / Athlon64 X2 6400+
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 9600GT 512MB / AMD Radeon HD 4830 512MB
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card with latest drivers
